newsitem.title: USA: Interim Services to buy AimExecutive.
newsitem.headline: Interim Services to buy AimExecutive.

text.p: Interim Services Inc said Wednesday it had signed a definitive agreement to acquire outplacement company AimExecutive Holdings Inc for $32.9 million and certain incentive payments based on future performance.
The company said the acquisition, which it expects to complete in the next 30 days, will add $0.03 per share to its fiscal 1997 earnings.
AimExecutive, based in Cleveland and Toledo, Ohio, had $34.6 million in revenues in 1996, Interim said.
Officials at Interim were not available to comment further.
